MFE.DEREGISTER.MESSAGE: Do you no longer want to use the Product Module "{{ITEM}}" in this Workspace?

TOOLTIPS.BASE_URL:
URL used to access the Product Module from the Workspace. 
Must start with a '/' (slash)
TOOLTIPS.REMOTE_BASE_URL: Base URL for this Product Module
TOOLTIPS.DISPLAY_NAME: Displayed name of the Product Module
TOOLTIPS.APP_ID: Unique ID of the Product for use in permission management. All modules of the Product must have the same Product ID.
TOOLTIPS.DEREGISTER: Do not use these Product Module in this Workspace anymore

MFES.REGISTER.TOOLTIP: Make an Product Module available for this Workspace
MFES.MFE_FORWARD: All menu URLs starting with this value will be forwarded to the corresponding Product Module - e.g. the Product Module Base URL
MFES.MFE_FORWARD_1: would catch both of the following URLs:

MESSAGES.MFE_DOES_NOT_EXIST: The assigned Product Module does not exist
MESSAGES.MFE_LOAD_ERROR: Failed to load Product Module list
MESSAGES.MFE_REGISTRATION_OK: The Product Module was successfully registered
MESSAGES.MFE_REGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Product Module registration
MESSAGES.MFE_ALREADY_EXISTS: The path is already in use
MESSAGES.MFE_DEREGISTRATION_OK: The Product Module was successfully deregistered
MESSAGES.MFE_DEREGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Product Module deregistration

ACTION.DISABLED: Green = Item is available in Menu - Changeable by click
ACTION.TREE_MODAL.TOOLTIP: Reorder of Menu Items via Drag & Drop and Preview in configured languages
ACTION.REORDER.TOOLTIP: Reorder of Menu Items via Drag & Drop

TOOLTIP.BADGE: Icon from the PrimeNG library which should be displayed next to the menu name
TOOLTIP.DISABLED: If set, the menu item is displayed inactive
TOOLTIP.MENU_ID: A unique identifier of the menu item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_ID: The identifier of the parent menu item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_NAME: The name of the parent menu item
TOOLTIP.PORTAL_EXIT: If set, the menu item exits the Workspace context
TOOLTIP.POSITION: An integer number that determines the position of the menu item in the menu structure
TOOLTIP.URL: The URL accessed by the menu item. Can be internal (via registered Product Module) or external (leaving the Workspace).

MENU.POSITION.TOOLTIP: Position path of the menu item in format [parent item.]item
MENU.URL.TOOLTIP: The URL to be called upon activation
MENU.MFE.TOOLTIP: Indicator whether the menu URL is offered by a registered Product Module
MENU.I18N.ROW.TOOLTIP: At least one translation is available
MENU.EXTERN.TOOLTIP: If checked then the Workspace is exit

LOGO.UPLOAD_FAIL: The file was not uploaded successfully

SEARCH.MENU_MANAGEMENT_DETAILS: Creation and editing of menu items for a Workspace
SEARCH.SEARCH_TOOLTIP: Search for the issues with given criteria

THEME.DETAIL.AUTO_APPLY_CURRENT_THEME: Changes are applied immediately when saving because it is the theme currently in use

TEMPLATE.SELECTOR.TOOLTIP: Choose an existing theme and use it as a template

TEMPLATE.CONFIRMATION.MESSAGE.EDIT: Should all existing color values be replaced by the values of "{{ITEM}}"?

TOOLTIPS.ID: Unique technical ID of the Theme
TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique Name of the Theme
TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: Name of the user which created the Theme
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_DATE: Timestamp the Theme was latest modified
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: Name of the user which changed the Theme last time

HTTP_STATUS_0.PORTALS: Unknown problem retrieving Workspace data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.MENUS: Unknown problem retrieving menu data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_403.PORTALS: You have no permissions to see workspaces.
HTTP_STATUS_403.MENUS: You have no permissions to see menus.

HTTP_STATUS_500.PORTALS: Unknown server problem retrieving Workspace data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.MENUS: Unknown server problem retrieving menu data - please try again.
